url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/inline_image_preview.jpg?id=8317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8760″ img_size=”1200*800″ style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Photography” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

In any event, many things need to be the focus on to make it successful and ensure its smooth functioning. However, for the memory part of that event which ensures that you can visualize that event later and smile while remembering those moments, photography can do this magic. Photography is something that is eventually very close to everyone in an event because all these décor, funky photo booth, happy faces will all be captured by photography and videography which you can see later and relieve all these beautiful moments.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603020747350{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/blue-white-bokeh-background-vector-6344567.jpg?id=7741) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

Archi Events truly understands this memory emotion and make sure that photography, in any event, is upto a certain standard. We emphasis a lot on customer value and the memory part of it. We specialize in all sort of photography ranging from traditional, modern-day candid’s and Creative Photography which includes the use of editing Softwares like Photoshop and Lightroom to make it unique. Our Team is with you in every step to guarantee your special moments is captured every time.  Our Team of professional photographers have a mix of Young enthusiast and experienced mentors. We are incredibly blessed to have such a team of photographers who knows the value of Customer and their emotion. To us, photography is about people being real and then letting us paint a picture of that moment to remember it forever.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8761″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603020737689{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/bd9e0717572f75bc6a7c5e2687d4e5bc-scaled.jpg?id=7963) !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][vc_single_image image=”8757″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services we Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

  • Pre Wedding Photography
  • Pre Wedding Videography
  • Digital Album
  • Candid Photography
  • Video Shoot
  • Drone Shoot
  • Instant Memory Gift
  • Live Telecast + Mixture

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
